beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE PEDT016 USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePath}PEDT016.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_ENT REFERENCED_COD_ENT from PEDT016_standardized_and_validated base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_PER REFERENCED_COD_PER from PEDT016_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp0 base left outer join HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.COD_PER=ref.COD_PER)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO REFERENCED_COD_CVE_RGTRO from PEDT016_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp1 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO ref on (base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.COD_EDO_REFUNDICION = ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO) where ref.COD_CATALOGO = '0006'

afterAll.sql: select * from errors_PEDT016_standardized_and_validated union all select * from errors_PEDT016_standardized_and_validated_and_domain0 union all select * from errors_PEDT016_standardized_and_validated_and_domain1 union all select * from errors_PEDT016_standardized_and_validated_and_domain2
